original_title: 昭和四十六年 大久保清の犯罪
overview: Arrested and interrogated by the police for a murder, Kiyoshi Ôkubo remembers his past and ends up confessing to several murders. Inspired by the true story of the serial killer who raped and killed eight women in Japan in 1971. The case moved the whole country.
title: The Crimes of Kiyoshi Ôkubo
